website_summaries.verdict: You can’t beat a classic, particularly a comfortable one at this price. These shoes are great for everyday wear.
pros: Praised for their price and comfortable fit, we love these shoes for everyday use
Many customers recommend them for their cushioning
cons: Many have found these shoes to be a little narrow
They also run a little on the heavier side, making them not ideal for activities such as long distance running

customer_reviews.title: Great quality of material
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 5 or 6 pairs of it during last 4-5 years. Different colours. Carbon/Black/Silver is the most durable one. Great quality of material. Very comportable and nice of foot. Well done Reebok.
customer_reviews.author: Lazibuma

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable. In summer they are hot
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these sneakers for 2 years. They are very comfortable. In summer they are hot, but here is spring and autumn, this is what you need! Your feet will rest. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David Nedelkov

customer_reviews.title: 5 Reebocks that fit fine. So I ordered these at 10
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of 10.5 Reebocks that fit fine. So I ordered these at 10.5. Weird shoes. I have narrow feet but these things are so tight at the toes and they are too short. The too short might have somethng to do with the uncomfortablely tight toes. Fail.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: I like the retro styling
customer_reviews.text: Very slick looking shoe. I like the retro styling. Pretty comfortable. Would not say would really want to wear all day, but can wear more than a few hours. The main thing I do not like is they are a warm shoe. The nylon does not breathe too well and my feet start to get hot. I have been wearing as a casual shoe. The overall design is fairly narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Stansel

customer_reviews.title: Very fair price, but quality suffers
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit great and look awesome. I was wearing a pair of Reebok Classic Leather Ripple shoes and they fit pretty much the same. However, the insole on both shoes were poorly glued down and can easily be lifted out. Also, the nylon on the top of the shoes, above the toes, has dark permanent crease marks where it folds as you squat or bend over. These dark crease marks appeared on the very first time I tried the shoes on and walked around the room. I will be returning these shoes and looking for something different.
customer_reviews.author: silenthill86

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. I ordered and received a 9 1/2 and they fit perfectly. Like some shoes, they were a bit stiff for the first couple weeks. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Holway

customer_reviews.title: A good value.
customer_reviews.text: A good value if you order a full size too big. The previous Reeboks I had came with a better arch support than these.
customer_reviews.author: P. Creel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price. decent support, better than $100 big N shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Bill from Pa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the money
customer_reviews.text: I used these for working out at the gym. Perfect for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Fknbozo

customer_reviews.title: Reeboks my friend
customer_reviews.text: Comfy simple Reeboks. You should buy some orthopedic insoles with these as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cochise Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They were slightly bigger than I expected, but they're really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if it looks good to you in the picture cos its the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Buy it if it looks good to you in the picture cos its the same in person.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The perfect shoe for me.
customer_reviews.text: They are wonderful, lovely, perfect. I had a pair years ago... I'd probably buy just similar shoes, they are so comfortable you have to try them to believe.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes for everyday use....have worn them for over 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Leon B. Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Love Reebok shoes
customer_reviews.text: Reebok sneakers are my favorite. I'm very happy with these. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio R

customer_reviews.title: LIKE THE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: HAVE WORN THIS STYLE BEFORE AND GLAD TO HAVE NEW PAIR.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Reebok's, been missing this style for years. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: W K.

customer_reviews.title: I love the look though
customer_reviews.text: These run big. Ordered the 11.5 too. Those are too small. I think my feet have a weird shape. I love the look though.
customer_reviews.author: jordanjandrew

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes, especially for the price. This is my second pair which I decided to buy because the first lasted longer than any that I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are almost perfect, but it gets too sweaty
customer_reviews.author: greatelchuy

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of the Classics but they are made ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the Classics but they are made a little narrow. I have skinny feet and they fit me snug. They feel pretty good on my feet but if you have wide feet these may not be the shoe for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Mosley

customer_reviews.title: great price for these shoes
customer_reviews.text: had to return shoes in my regular size but ordered one size up and they fit perfect. 4 stars because the size is off
customer_reviews.author: diane a

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reeboks are smaller shoes for some odd reason good thing I ordered an 8 when I'm normally a 7.5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fit i've had in 20 years
customer_reviews.text: Best fit i've had in 20 years! Most comfortable shoe I've worn in 20 years. First shoe I've purchased in 20 years. Haha! Great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: David S. Benegar

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, very good price and so comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking , very good price and so comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe for the price except its little bit narrower than i thought.so one should go for just over 1 size to get confortable wear.
customer_reviews.author: bbpdg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these sneakers....this is properly my 4th pair i've owned....
customer_reviews.author: The Man of Steel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a breeze to order and fit my husband perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mellott

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! The black and white ones are simple yet smart and look good with joggers. Comfortable AF!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe @ good price
customer_reviews.text: Great, light & comfortable shoe. Color is neutral to coordinate with casual or sport.
customer_reviews.author: James Carney

customer_reviews.title: wrong shoe
customer_reviews.text: Should have been black with white accents with white and black sole like picture but received black with baby blue accents with white and tan sole. I kind of liked them so it wasn't worth the hassle to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Berry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a size 9 with Nikes but I needed a 9.5 to fit these
customer_reviews.author: Bawss

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Good arch support for being on your feet all day
customer_reviews.author: James O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great I remember having these sneakers when I was a kid
customer_reviews.author: adrian reyes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes for a reasonable price. The upper is in good condition but the sole will probably be smooth soon, similar to New Balance 574, Saucony Jazz, ect. If I can find a sneaker that has a sole that lasts more than 3 months, I'll buy 4 pairs of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: I liked them so much and love getting the runaround so ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked them so much and love getting the runaround so much that I had to file a claim . You've got to be kidding me. .
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McClay

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Classic Nylon R13 Shoe
product_meta.description: Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, Joseph William Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, J.W. Foster and Sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
feature_bullets: Logo patch at tongue and laces
